```{r}
#| label: skills

skill_sheet <- read_excel(path, sheet = "skills")

hybrid_cv_skills <- skill_sheet %>% 
    separate_rows(profile, sep = ",\\s*") %>%
    filter(.data$profile == .env$profile) %>%
    group_by(hybrid_group) %>%
    arrange(order_short, .by_group = TRUE) %>%
    ungroup()

hybrid_groups <- unique(hybrid_cv_skills$hybrid_group)

grouped_skills <- map(hybrid_groups, ~ filter_and_pull(hybrid_cv_skills, hybrid_group, .x, skill))
names(grouped_skills) <- hybrid_groups


```
